net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.event

Interface ColumnModelListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllListener

    public interface ColumnModelListener
extends EventListener
    Events dealing with changes in a ColumnModel.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void columnAdded(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column was added to the model.
      void columnHidden(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column has been hidden.
      void columnMoved(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column was repositioned.
      void columnRemoved(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column was removed from the model.
      void columnSelectionChanged(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that the selection model of the ColumnModel changed.
      void columnShown(ColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column has been shown.

    • Method Detail

      • columnAdded

        void columnAdded(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that a column was added to the model.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.

      • columnHidden

        void columnHidden(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that a column has been hidden. Only called if the column had been previously shown, which is the case for all columns when the model is created.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.

      • columnMoved

        void columnMoved(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that a column was repositioned.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.

      • columnRemoved

        void columnRemoved(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that a column was removed from the model.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.

      • columnSelectionChanged

        void columnSelectionChanged(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that the selection model of the ColumnModel changed.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.

      • columnShown

        void columnShown(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Tells listeners that a column has been shown. Only called if the column had been previously hidden.
        Parameters:
        e - The event object.
